title: anyone else feel as if league has shitter players now?
body:
legit can't have a fun game even in ranked anymore because people wanna be carried but also have no input for anything. especially if it's past 11:30pm in Australia. 

not only is english no longer a thing the game is unplayable. call me what ever you want its facts not being racist

replies.body: absolutely. 3 years ago worlds + could orientate lane swaps, now they cant. the average user cant buy a ward. this game is garbage and its users are trash. this place is a cesspool containment board for the retarded.

If your playing around midnight you get bad players that are high on crack or on the bottle . 50/50 youll get people wanting to throw . Not sure why u would rank around that time tbh. Mid day I can understand but late towards midnight is were the trolls come out from there bridges to run down mid or tax ways or even have no interest of winning the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Dan Lok FU Money,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=UHOr8EqZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-12T22:17:58.909+0000)
>
> If your playing around midnight you get bad players that are high on crack or on the bottle . 50/50 youll get people wanting to throw . Not sure why u would rank around that time tbh. Mid day I can understand but late towards midnight is were the trolls come out from there bridges to run down mid or tax ways or even have no interest of winning the game.

I work during the day,
